text: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a field that focuses on creating machines able to mimic human intelligence. It includes machine learning and deep learning.
summary: AI creates machines that mimic human intelligence.

text: Neural networks are computing systems inspired by biological neurons. They process complex data like images and text.
summary: Neural networks mimic neurons to handle complex data.

text: Climate change leads to rising temperatures and extreme weather events, impacting ecosystems worldwide.
summary: Climate change causes extreme weather worldwide.
